name: Captain vs Sky Pirates (itch)
description:
Captain vs Sky Pirates takes you on a steamy adventure, your mission is to defeat all Sky Pirates. Combat many dangerous enemies but don’t forget to upgrade your gear to beat more deadly Sky Pirates.
Prepare for a near impossible challenge in the world of steam Pirates

Features:
- Upgrade weapons and explosives
- 30 levels
- Epic bosses
- Beautiful art and character animations
- Huge variety of enemies offer multiple challenges: Burn your enemy, freeze them, and many more tools to cast in battle.
